original_title: New Director General appointed to Bribery Commission
original_body_lines: Colombo, April 2 (Daily Mirror)- President Ranil Wickremesinghe has appointed W.K.D. Wijerathne as the Director General of the Commission to Investigate Allegations of Bribery or Corruption, the President's Media Division (PMD) said.
The President has made the appointment in accordance with the provisions of the new Anti-corruption Act.
